name: Simple TNX/XAP Widget
author: mad31

sections.description:
Simple TNX/XAP Widget Plugin is very easy to use. Plugin add special widget in widget panel. Your can add this widget in any place of yours sidebars. All your need is a input your login name in TNX.NET/XAP.RU in special widget.

Upgrade

Upgrade Simple TNX/XAP Widget is easy, just replace plugin file (simple_tnx_xap_widget.php) in plugin directory with new version. No need to re-config any options in widget.
sections.installation:
1. Unpack file package using your favorite zip software.
    1. Upload .php file to your wordpress plugin directory on your server.
    2. Login to wordpress admin and go to plugin tab and activate Simple XAP Widget Plugin.
    3. Go to Design => Widget and add widget Simple TNX/XAP Widget into sidebar.
    4. Open Edit of widget. Enter your TNX/XAP login and if you want enter the block links name. Save your change.
sections.faq:
Where to enter the name of a confidential folder

There is no necessity. The plugin uses only a static code.
